meta.title: Emiliano Alfonso - Fullstack Web Developer
meta.description: Explore my portfolio showcasing front-end and full-stack projects crafted with technologies such as React, Redux, and Express. You will also find my CV and ways to get in touch.

hero.description: I am a web developer who focuses on the small details, and on simple, accessible and adaptable designs.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Fullstack developer, music teacher, Front-end lover. I attended a bootcamp with more than 700 hours of intensive learning that prepared me to work as a web developer, creating projects that were both real and complex. Furthermore, the bootcamp greatly improved my interpersonal skills and gave me the opportunity of teaching to beginner students.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: These are the technologies I work with:

projects.description: Here you can see some of the projects I have worked on:

gamingHub.description: An e-commerce for selling digital videogames. Built with React, Redux, Express, PostgreSQL, Sequelize, Firebase, and Passport.

quizMeApp.description: Mobile app where you can answer quizzes from a variety of categories. Built with React Native, MongoDB, and GraphQL. The admin dashboard was made using Next.js and TypeScript.

whiteboard.description: A simple drawing app created in order to learn and practice the usage of HTML Canvas. Made with HTML, CSS and vanilla Javascript.

movye.description: Web app where you can search for a movie and see its information, add it to your favorites or your watchlist. Made using Next.js.
